host.description: The FQDN or IP address to contact for origination traffic.

port.description: The designated origination route port. Defaults to `5060`.

priority.description: The priority associated with the host, with 1 being the highest priority. Higher priority hosts are attempted first.

protocol.description: The protocol to use for the origination route. Encryption-enabled Amazon Chime Voice Connectors use TCP protocol by default.

weight.description: The weight associated with the host. If hosts are equal in priority, calls are redistributed among them based on their relative weight.
